title: iPhones Are Finally Getting Better
description:
In this video I discuss how the iPhone 15 finally has some features that are appealing to me, mostly the change over to USB C charging ports and titanium frames for the iPhone Pro as well as some of the things I didn't like about the keynote

0:00 Buy a Libre shirt
0:26 Apple keynote got more views than any other
1:00 iPhone 15 will use USB C charging
1:30 iPhone 15 is easier to repair
3:38 How difficult will battery replacements bs
4:58 iPhone 15 Pro can play Resident Evil 4 and other AAA Titles
7:18 iPhone 15 Pro will have a programmable button instead of mute switch
8:08 iPhone 15 Pro will have a titanium frame
11:20 Apple is overdoing the fake environmentalism grift
13:26 Apple Watch bands are no longer leather
14:56 Double tap will not be available on new Apple Watch at launch or on older watches
